thread.title: UM's LeVert on watch list for Jerry West Award
thread.title_full: UM's LeVert on watch list for Jerry West Award

author: detroitnews.com
title: UM's LeVert on watch list for Jerry West Award
text:
Caris LeVert (Photo: Robin Buckson, Detroit News) 
1 CONNECT 10 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Michigan's Caris LeVert is one of 20 players named to the preseason watch list for the Jerry West Award, presented to the top shooting guard in the country.
LeVert was injured midway through last season and missed the remainder of his junior campaign. At the time he was leading the Wolverines in scoring (14.9), rebounds (4.9), assists (3.7), steals (1.7) and minutes (35.8).
Michigan has a 75-33 record during the time that LeVert has been a Wolverine.
LeVert enters his senior season needing 177 points to become the 49th Michigan player with 1,000.
JERRY WEST AWARD WATCH LIST 
Allonzo Trier, Arizona
Anthony Drmic, Boise State
Kellen Dunham, Butler
Jordan Matthews, California
Grayson Allen, Duke
Dwayne Bacon, Florida State
Marvell Harris, Fresno State
James Blackmon, Indiana
AJ English, Iona
Antonio Blakeney, Louisiana State
Rasheed Sulaimon, Maryland
Sheldon McClellan, Miami
Caris LeVert, Michigan
Malik Newman, Mississippi State
Buddy Hield, Oklahoma
E.C. Matthews, Rhode Island
Danuel House, Texas A&M
Melvin Johnson, Virginia Commonwealth
Malcom Brogdon, Virginia
Ron Baker, Wichita State
